immigration-related sections of 2010 UK party manifestos

Extracts from the election manifestos of 9 UK political parties from 2010, related to immigration or asylum-seekers.

data_char_ukimmig2010

Format

A named character vector of plain ASCII texts

Examples

data_corpus_ukimmig2010 <-
    corpus(data_char_ukimmig2010,
           docvars = data.frame(party = names(data_char_ukimmig2010)))
metadoc(data_corpus_ukimmig2010, "language") <- "english"
summary(data_corpus_ukimmig2010, showmeta = TRUE)
#> Corpus consisting of 9 documents:
#> 
#>          Text Types Tokens Sentences        party _language
#>           BNP  1125   3280        88          BNP   english
#>     Coalition   142    260         4    Coalition   english
#>  Conservative   251    499        15 Conservative   english
#>        Greens   322    679        21       Greens   english
#>        Labour   298    683        29       Labour   english
#>        LibDem   251    483        14       LibDem   english
#>            PC    77    114         5           PC   english
#>           SNP    88    134         4          SNP   english
#>          UKIP   346    723        27         UKIP   english
#>
